meanings.definition: Of or relating to the work or skills of a draftsman.
meanings.sent1: Her draftsmanly drawings were precise and detailed.
meanings.sent2: The draftsmanly tools were neatly organized on the desk.
meanings.sent3: He tried to cook dinner in a draftsmanly way, measuring every ingredient meticulously.
meanings.sent4: The architect's vision was brought to life through his draftsmanly execution.
meanings.sent5: The draftsmanly blueprint captured every intricate detail of the building.

meanings.definition: In a manner characteristic of a draftsman.
meanings.sent1: He sketched draftsmanly, with steady hands and focused attention.
meanings.sent2: The artist drew draftsmanly, ensuring straight lines and accurate proportions.
meanings.sent3: She danced draftsmanly, moving gracefully and precisely to the music.
meanings.sent4: The car was parked draftsmanly, perfectly aligned with the curb.
meanings.sent5: The writer edited draftsmanly, carefully revising each sentence for clarity.
